attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have been brought up to say im a british citizen by my family. Now i want to be able to say im english. Scots can call themselves scottish, same for the welsh but in england we have to say british. Lets bring back the pride of St George and the Red Cross

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/britpride/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
